name: Lemons! - A Deck-Building Lemmings Game
description:
—NOW UPDATED TO ACTUALLY WORK!—

Lemons! is a deck-building “save the creatures” game loosely inspired by the classic computer game Lemmings.

Protect your Lemons are they march toward their doom by placing helpful objects. However, the objects you can place are randomly drawn from a deck of cards YOU build!

Each level you complete will earn you gold to buy cards that are unlocked as you progress.

NOTE: Mac and Linux builds not tested. I just packaged the output Unity gave me... hope it works!

Controls:

  • UI Interactions: Mouse
  • Place Item: Left click
  • Flip item: Right click
  • Move Camera: WASD (Be careful, there are no bounds and you can get lost)

NOTE: You can't place items if you are hovering over the GUI! Move the camera!

Last minute bug fixed (Done during submission hour):

  • Fixed collider for ramp item
  • Increased camera movement speed to a reasonable value
  • Fixed the booster card not functioning properly
  • Fixed issue with scene management/level loading
